title: Parashant Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Make an adventure of learning! Though Parashant National Monument is remote, students can learn about the natural and cultural history of this beautiful resource through our online resources.  Geology Curriculum for grades 6-9         Teacher-Ranger-Teacher Are you a teacher who likes to spend time outdoors and in the national parks? The Teacher-Ranger-Teacher program may be just what you are looking for.         Looking to develop a career in land management? Parashant offers summer internships that help develop administrative, field, and management skills. Check out these and other internship opportunities offered by the Intergovernmental Internship Cooperative.
